Method Detail

attachVolume

void attachVolume(String volumeId,
                  String device)
                  throws RemoteStorageOperationException,
                         LocalStorageOperationException
Attaches a volume storage device to the local machine.

Parameters:
volumeId - - the id of the volume to be attached.
device - - the device name of the volume.
Throws:
RemoteStorageOperationException - - thrown in case something went wrong during the remote call.
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown in case a local operation on the storage volume failed (mount, format..)

createVolume

String createVolume(String templateName)
                    throws RemoteStorageOperationException,
                           TimeoutException
Creates a volume from the given template name. the template must be pre defined in the cloud configuration file the bootstrap was performed with. will use a default timeout of 1 minute.

Parameters:
templateName - - the storage template name to be used when creating the volume.
Returns:
the volume id.
Throws:
RemoteStorageOperationException - - thrown in case something went wrong during the remote call.
TimeoutException - - thrown when there was a timeout in creating the volume.

createVolume

String createVolume(String templateName,
                    long timeoutInMillis)
                    throws RemoteStorageOperationException,
                           TimeoutException
Creates a volume from the given template name. the template must be pre defined in the cloud configuration file the bootstrap was performed with.

Parameters:
templateName - - the storage template name to be used when creating the volume.
timeoutInMillis - - the timeout for the createVolume API call. if the timeout is exceeded but the volume was created a call to deleteVolume(String) will be executed.
Returns:
the volume id.
Throws:
RemoteStorageOperationException - - thrown in case something went wrong during the remote call.
TimeoutException - - thrown when there was a timeout in creating the volume.

detachVolume

void detachVolume(String volumeId)
                  throws RemoteStorageOperationException,
                         LocalStorageOperationException
detaches the volume from the machine.

Parameters:
volumeId - - the volume id to detach.
Throws:
RemoteStorageOperationException - - thrown in case something went wrong during the remote call.
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown in case a local operation on the storage volume failed (mount, format..)

deleteVolume

void deleteVolume(String volumeId)
                  throws RemoteStorageOperationException
deletes the volume with the given id.

Parameters:
volumeId - - the volume id to delete.
Throws:
RemoteStorageOperationException - - thrown in case something went wrong during the remote call.

format

void format(String device,
            String fileSystem,
            long timeoutInMillis)
            throws LocalStorageOperationException,
                   TimeoutException
format a device to a given file system.

Parameters:
device - - device name.
fileSystem - - file system type.
timeoutInMillis - - the timeout after which the process will be terminated forcefully.
Throws:
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown when the command fails.
TimeoutException - - in case of a timeout.

format

void format(String device,
            String fileSystem)
            throws LocalStorageOperationException,
                   TimeoutException
format a device to a given file system. uses a default timeout of 5 minutes. to use a custom timeout use format(String, String, long).

Parameters:
device - - device name.
fileSystem - - file system type.
Throws:
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown when the command fails.
TimeoutException - - in case of a timeout.

mount

void mount(String device,
           String path,
           long timeoutInMillis)
           throws LocalStorageOperationException,
                  TimeoutException
mount a device to a local mounting point.

Parameters:
device - - device name.
path - - mounting point (will be created automatically).
timeoutInMillis - - the timeout after which the process will be terminated forcefully.
Throws:
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown when the command fails.
TimeoutException - - in case of a timeout.

mount

void mount(String device,
           String path)
           throws LocalStorageOperationException,
                  TimeoutException
mount a device to a local mounting point. uses a default timeout of 30 seconds. to use a custom timeout use mount(String, String, long).

Parameters:
device - - device name.
path - - mounting point (will be created automatically).
Throws:
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown when the command fails.
TimeoutException - - in case of a timeout.

unmount

void unmount(String device,
             long timeoutInMillis)
             throws LocalStorageOperationException,
                    TimeoutException
unmounts a device from the file system. usually used before detaching it.

Parameters:
device - - the device to unmount
timeoutInMillis - - the timeout for executing the process.
Throws:
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown when the command fails.
TimeoutException - - in case of a timeout.

unmount

void unmount(String device)
             throws LocalStorageOperationException,
                    TimeoutException
unmounts a device from the file system. usually used before detaching it. uses default timeout of 15 seconds. to use a custom timeout use unmount(String, long).

Parameters:
device - - the device to unmount
Throws:
LocalStorageOperationException - - thrown when the command fails.
TimeoutException - - in case of a timeout.

getTemplate

StorageTemplate getTemplate(String templateName)
get the storage template defined in the cloud driver.

Parameters:
templateName - - the template name.
Returns:
StorageTemplate.
